UFC 196
McGregor vs Diaz
March 5, 2016 Las Vegas MGM Grand Garden Arena
UFC featherweight champion Conor McGregor and the fiery Nate Diaz will meet in a highly anticipated matchup at UFC 196 on Saturday, March 5th live from the MGM Grand Garden Arena in Las Vegas, Nevada.

The UFC 196 Post-fight Press Conference will begin shortly following the conclusion of UFC 196.

Exclusive Fight Pass Prelims
Diego Sanchez vs Jim Miller is the Featured Bout on the UFC 196 FIGHT PASS Prelims. Also included, Jason Saggo vs Justin Salas and Julian Erosa vs Teruto Ishihara.

Prelims
The UFC 196 Prelims include 4 bouts and feature a welterweight showdown between Brandon Thatch and Siyar Bahadurzada.
120
Watch Video
UFC 196 Cold Open
UFC featherweight champion Conor McGregor and UFC lightweight clash in an incredible welterweight main event, while women's bantamweight champion Holly Holm defends her belt against Miesha Tate.
1:41
Watch Video
UFC 196 Embedded: Vlog Series - Episode 4
On Episode 4 of UFC 196 Embedded, UFC featherweight champion Conor McGregor continues to enjoy the welterweight lifestyle, playing to fans at the open workout alongside fellow headliner Nate Diaz. Women’s bantamweight Miesha Tate continues her mission to become the divison’s champion, while defending queen Holly Holm invites an open workout spectator on stage. UFC 196 Embedded is an all-access, behind-the-scenes video blog following the stars of UFC 196: McGregor vs. Diaz, Saturday, March 5 on Pay-Per-View.
6:32
Watch Video
UFC 196: Jim Miller Exclusive Interview
Ahead of his Featured Bout on the UFC FIGHT PASS Prelims at UFC 196 against Diego Sanchez, Jim Miller stopped by for an exclusive interview.
1:10
Watch Video
UFC 196: Miesha Tate - Championship Destiny
Miesha Tate chats with Megan Olivi about fighting Holly Holm, fight week in her hometown and much more.

Conor McGregor, Nate Diaz, Holly Holm, Miesha Tate and Dana White are all scheduled to appear at the UFC 196 Pre-fight Press Conference.

Did You Know?

Did you know about one of the coolest features for UFC.TV members, Live Scoring?

You can be watching an event live on your computer or TV and score rounds as they happen on your smartphone or tablet with the new UFC.TV app!

Try it now to see how you stack up against your friends and the real UFC judges.
